function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Inadequate surface disinfection in unoccupied rooms","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited differentiation of covid-19 from other viral infections","category":"Poor access to Diagnostics and Treatment","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Paucity of good quality data on uv-c irradiation of sars-cov-1, sars-cov-2, and mers-cov in the air","category":"Lack of effective medical solutions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of understanding of the relationship between rh and ah may lead to misinterpretation of humidity’s role in disease transmission.","category":"Misinterpretation of data and results","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Impact of interventions on contagious disease spread","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased awareness of the importance of exercise and immunity during the pandemic","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Predicting the spread of coronavirus and planning healthcare capacity based on data analysis may result in insufficient consideration of social and behavioral factors that influence disease transmission.","category":"Misinterpretation of data and results","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential second waves of covid-19 infection","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient attention to public health impacts","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"No statistically significant correlation between covid-19 risk perception and anxiety factor 2","category":"Misinterpretation of data and results","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Inability to assess seasonal patterns and mutated versions of sars-cov-2","category":"Lack of effective medical solutions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Utilization of advanced rna detection methods like crispr and dpcr for virus detection and quantification presents the risk of misinterpretation or inadequate understanding of the results compared to traditional methods like rt-qpcr.","category":"Misinterpretation of data and results","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased risk of spreading contagious diseases through physical interaction in retail spaces.","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poor hand hygiene","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Introduction of quarantine facilities and sanitation policies","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Health risk","category":"Healthcare resource shortage and management","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of prevention measures for virus propagation workers","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Rapid spread from animals to humans","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Discussion of the potential of quarantine measures, hospital isolation measures, and self-protection measures to alleviate the spread of the epidemic","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of quick and early detection of the disease","category":"Failure to implement preventive
